overview: This Silent Short film portrays Paul, a broke, depressed man struggling through life day-to-day. A loved one of his is terribly ill, and he wishes to visit them. After discovering their heightened love for music, due to the loss of their voice, he works and works just to scratch up some cash to purchase them a gift (a vinyl record). He takes part in cleaning duties at several houses, including Donnieâ€™s house. Does the person pass away earlier than expected? Does he give them the gift in time?
tagline: What is cinema you may ask, Capriccio is what it is.
title: Capriccio
